synopsis.text:
Japanese anime "Okko's Inn" tells the heartwarming tale of Okko, a young girl who, after losing her parents in a car accident, moves to the countryside to live with her grandmother. Her grandmother runs a traditional Japanese inn, built on an ancient spring with healing waters, where Okko begins her journey to become the next caretaker.

In this new environment, Okko discovers that she has the unique ability to see and interact with friendly spirits who reside in the inn. These ghostly companions provide comfort, friendship, and guidance as she navigates her new life. The inn's motto, "welcoming all and rejecting none," is put to the test as Okko faces challenges while catering to a diverse group of guests.

Through her dedication to others and the support of her spectral friends, Okko learns valuable lessons about empathy, responsibility, and the healing power of helping others. This enchanting anime from Madhouse and director Kitaro Kosaka beautifully intertwines the supernatural with the trials and joys of human life, creating a captivating and touching story that will leave viewers inspired.
